Title: Enacts the "MWBE equality act"
Summary: Enacts the "MWBE equality act" to add ethno-religious groups as minority group members for the purposes of MWBE; defines ethno-religious persons as unified by a common religious and ethnic background.
LawCode: Amd §§310 & 821, Exec L; amd §2879, Pub Auth L; amd §210, Ec Dev L; amd §52-0113, En Con L; amd §428, Transp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the public authorities law, the economic development law, the environmental conservation law and the transportation law, in relation to adding ethno-religious groups as minority group members
